channel.title: Is it good? Client installation No Rar Needed [ Explain inside ]
channel.description: Well i have made an installer for my client files so no more .rar is needed. You just gotta download the client and install it than press the icon on desktop or inside the folder to run it. Whats your oppinion, Is it good or not?
